# cpd-avatar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                              | Type                  | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ---------------------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `idName`        | `id-name`        | ID for generating hash colours           | `string`              | `""`        |
| `name`          | `name`           | The name (first initial used as default) | `string`              | `""`        |
| `renderingType` | `rendering-type` | The avatar's rendering type              | `"round" \| "square"` | `"round"`   |
| `size`          | `size`           | The avatar's size                        | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `src`           | `src`            | The avatar's source                      | `string`              | `undefined` |
